bug.short_desc: Adding as an Eclipse Blogger to PlanetEclipse

long_desc.thetext:
Hey There
I am Annamalai ... CTO of ANCiT Consulting ... an Eclipse Foundation Member Firm. I am an eclipse enthusiast, which is visible from my company activities.
I would be really happy to be added as an eclipse blogger on PlanetEclipse.org along with the others ...
I currently hav a list of wikis updates, organiser of Eclipse Demo Camp in India, Few proposed patches for EMF, supported of J2EESpider Project and editor of soon to launch free eclipse circulatory called as Eclipse in Clips.
I have trained about more than 250 professionals in INDIA in a various Companies and therefore request you to do the needful to add my blog on the blogger list ...
My blog link is http://eclipseo.blogspot.com ...
Thank you ..
regards Annamalai CTO ANCiT Consulting
PLease find this request raised earlier also .. but there was no response. https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=199354

So why wast foundation resources and open a duplicate issue then?
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 199354 ***
